data.title: Chris Koch Obituary 2016
data.meta_description: Chris Koch age 85, of Clarksville passed away on August 5, 2016. Funeral services will be Monday, August 8, 2016 at 2:00 pm at Sykes Funeral Home. The family will receive friend...
data.text:
Chris Koch age 85, of Clarksville passed away on August 5, 2016. Funeral services will be Monday, August 8, 2016 at 2:00 pm at Sykes Funeral Home. The family will receive friends on Monday from 12 noon until the time of service at the funeral home.

She was born on December 25, 1930 in Cunningham, TN to Burley and Martha Baggett Hodges. She was a member of First Baptist Church.

Chris is survived by her loving husband of 65 years, Owen Koch, sons; Mark Koch, Jeffery Koch, and Victor Koch, and daughter, Valerie Goodson, 11 grandchildren, and 3 great grandchildren.

Online condolences may be made at sykesfuneralhome.com
